name: Pepo Pumpkin Patch
description: The Pumpkin Patch is an adorable pattern that will help you knit the most beautiful pumpkins for the Autumn season!
sizes_available: approx. diameter of 8, 11, 14 cm / 3,25", 4,25", 5,5" or made to measure
full_text: The Pumpkin Patch is an adorable pattern that will help you knit the most beautiful pumpkins for the Autumn season! The instructions are available in the round and flat so you can make it as you prefer. And there’s a video tutorial to help you shape and finish your pumpkin!! PATTERN INFORMATION: Available Sizes: approx. diameter of 8, 11, 14 cm / 3,25”, 4,25”, 5,5” or made to measure Construction: Knitted in the round or knitted flat Experience level: Advanced Beginner. Yarn: I used worsted weight yarn but you can use any yarn of your choice Needles: I used 4mm (US 6) needles, but you can use any needles size of your choice Languages: English, Portuguese and Spanish THIS IS A DIGITAL FILE (PDF Knitting Pattern), NOT the actual finished item. YOU CANNOT RESELL MY PATTERN, HOWEVER YOU CAN SELL THE FINISHED ITEM. ©Agasalhos e Bugalhos All Rights Reserved. If you need any information or have any questions regarding this pattern, feel free to contact me. I will be happy to help. I hope you enjoy this pattern!! With love Sandra
